entry.title: $2295 // Spacious 1 Bedroom Apt/ With Washer Dryer In Unit
entry.content:
Text Marc show contact info

Beautiful one bedroom duplex with high ceilings, large windows and lovely exposures. The oversized living room facing North onto tree-lined 1st Street has a top of the line kitchen featuring stone countertops, custom cabinets with Bosch stainless steel appliances. There is a new spa like marble bath with deep soaking tub. The bedroom is upstairs, has good closet space and excellent natural light. Additional features include, wide plank floors throughout, recessed soffit lights and a Bosch washer/dryer. Completed an extensive renovation with new common hallways, landscaped private outdoor space and a virtual doorman phone app based system. The outdoor space features an electric grill range, seating areas, a pergola and a bike rack. Conveniently located near mass transit and a short walk to Prospect Park, Barclays Center, the Park Slope Food Coop and some of the best restaurants and boutiques that Brooklyn has to offer.
